name: Don Edmunds
introduction: Don Edmunds (born 23 September 1930 and died 11 August 2020) was an American racing driver and car builder who participated in the three Indianapolis 500 races between 1957 and 1959. He only qualified for the 1957 Indianapolis 500, which counted towards the Formula One championship, but he did not score any points. However, he was the 1957 Indianapolis 500 Rookie of the Year.
